# iosxe_bgp_ipv4_mvpn_neighbor (Data Source)

This data source can read the BGP IPv4 MVPN Neighbor configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxe_bgp_ipv4_mvpn_neighbor" "example" {
  asn = "65000"
  ip  = "172.16.255.4"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `asn` (String)
- `ip` (String)

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `activate` (Boolean) Enable the address family for this neighbor
- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `send_community` (String)
